Dear {{client_name}},

This is to remind you that the settlement offer of {{currency}} {{offer_amount}} in your case expires on {{deadline}}.

We have {{days_remaining}} days to respond. Please let us know your decision so we can proceed accordingly.

If you haven't already discussed this with us, please call to schedule a brief consultation.

Best regards,
{{lawyer_name}}
{{firm_name}}
